related.meaning: berdiri terbalik, berdiri di atas kepala

lessons.japanese: 各色間の調和に欠けているのでこの絵は目立つ。
lessons.indonesian: The lack of harmony between colors makes this painting stand out.

lessons.japanese: トムはとても頭がいいので授業で目立つ。
lessons.indonesian: Tom is so intelligent that he stands out in class.
Bamboo stands out in the woods.

lessons.japanese: 赤は白をバックにするとよく目立つ。
lessons.indonesian: Red shows up well against a white background.

lessons.indonesian: The lack of harmony between colors makes this painting stand out.
